title: 【國際交流活動】明日株式會社 Skyline 2025 寒假日本見習計畫
department: 國際事務處國際學生組

author.department: 國際事務處國際學生組
author.name: 呂姿穎

content:
分類： 活動公告
來源： 國際事務處國際學生組 - 呂姿穎 - issa@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話5173
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【國際交流活動】明日株式會社 Skyline 2025 寒假日本見習計畫
日期： Thu, 7 Nov 2024 14:24:43 +0800
附檔： 2025 日本職涯探索暨海外研學計畫_宣傳文宣.png (3 MB)   
English version in below

◎時間：

2025.01.13 ~ 2025.01.17

2025.01.20 ~ 2025.01.24

◎地點：日本  東京大學或早稻田大學

◎費用：34,900 台幣 (不包含機票及其他個人花費，早鳥優惠請查看簡章)

◎報名截止時間：2024.12.27

◎報名流程

1.填寫google 表單向國際處報名，同時繳交以下文件：

Google form：https://reurl.cc/2jAzQ9

*在學證明
*家長同意書 

2.自行到連結報名: https://skyline.tw/activity/Skyline_2025_WinterJapan

3.等待 Skyline 通知。

(簡章請上國際處網站查看)

English version

◎Period：

January 13~ January 17, 2025

January 20~ January 24, 2025

◎Location：The University of Tokyo、WASEDA University, Japan

◎Fee：34,900 NTD

(Excluding airfare, and other personal expenses)

(There is an early bird discount, please refer to the brochure for details.)

◎Registration Deadline：December 27, 2024

1. Sign up via google form and upload below documents to OIA.
Google form：https://reurl.cc/2jAzQ9

*Student Status Certificate
*Parental Consent Letter

2. Complete application at : https://skyline.tw/activity/Skyline_2025_WinterJapan
3. Await the announcement from Skyline.

For further information, please visit the OIA website and check out the broure.

Please note:

1. For detailed application instructions and other information, please refer to the brochure.
2. The OIA only announces or assists our school’s students in registering for short-term activities or courses offered by contracted schools. Whether credits from these short-term courses can be transferred to our school is subject to the regulations of the Academic Affairs Office, and participating students must comply accordingly. If the activity falls within our school’s academic semester, students must follow our school’s regulations to apply for leave of absence.
